returns._authorized: Whether the account is authorized or not

params._amountToBuy: Amount of system coins to buy (rad)
params._id: ID of the auction you want to submit the bid for

params._data: Encoded data to modify the parameter
params._param: String identifier of the parameter to modify

params._cType: String identifier of the collateral to modify
params._data: Encoded data to modify the parameter
params._param: String identifier of the parameter to modify

params._id: ID of the auction to restart
ID of the auction to settle

params._amountToSell: Total amount of system coins to sell (rad)

params._id: ID of the auction to settle/terminate

authorizedAccounts(address).notice: Checks whether an account is authorized

increaseBidSize(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Submit a higher protocol token bid for the same amount of system coins

modifyParameters(bytes32,bytes).notice: Set a new value for a global specific parameter

modifyParameters(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).notice: Set a new value for a collateral specific parameter

restartAuction(uint256).notice: Restart an auction if no bids were submitted for it

documentation.text: @notice Disable the auction house (usually called by AccountingEngine)

@notice Restart an auction if no bids were submitted for it
 @param _id ID of the auction to restart

@notice Settle/finish an auction
 @param _id ID of the auction to settle

@notice Terminate an auction prematurely.
 @param _id ID of the auction to settle/terminate
